attributes.action: encourage developers to build houses with garages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In todays' time car is an essential think to have because of lack end expense of public transport and rights of freedom.
Because of this new houses which are so expensive should have garage thus preventing vast number of cars parked on streets [this increases cases of crime i.e. theft from cars/vandalism/etc. and looks untidy!].

Moreover, having car does not mean it is used avery day and for every journey - I know people who own cars but cycle to work/town/shopping and uses car when it is strongly needed to do so!!!

If You want live in tidy country and have Your basic rights respected please support this petition. Thanks.

If government want people not to own a car they should begin form themselves and sell their cars ASAP!
